h3_title: Kang-Jin Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Other times, with a particularly loud roar, the boss will summon a giant circle of lightning strikes all around them. They only hit a few times in different spots, and usually at a fair distance from the boss, so pursuing it and keeping close is often the way to go.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Kang-Jin_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Kang-Jin Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Kang-Jin Loong' and the sub-subsection 'Kang-Jin Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Other times, with a particularly loud roar, the boss will summon a giant circle of lightning strikes all around them. They only hit a few times in different spots, and usually at a fair distance from the boss, so pursuing it and keeping close is often the way to go.
